name: The Adventures of Karkat Vantas and the Mystery of the Crabby Patty
name_original: The Adventures of Karkat Vantas and the Mystery of the Crabby Patty
description:
!! WARNING !!

This game contains content inappropriate for underage audiences,

such as death, violence, mature language, mentions of sexual implication,

and disturbing visuals.

Viewer discretion is advised. 

A Homestuck Fan game made by UberTheMeh (@rudfkr0316 on twitter)

Have you ever wanted to play a game as Karkat Vantas from the hit 2009 web comic Homestuck?
No? Well too effin bad cuz that's whatcha getting baybeeeeeeeeee

Talk to a variety of characters!
Make choices and change the world!

Get all 14 endings!
I'm putting too much effort into this!!!!

THE ADVENTURES OF KARKAT VANTAS AND THE MYSTERY OF THE CRABBY PATTY

Play now!

Credits:
